FuncDef: The display sftp client command displays all of the currently effective configuration on the SFTP client. The display sftp client command displays all of the currently effective configuration on the SFTP client.
ExtraInfo: After the source IP address of an SFTP client is set, you can run the display sftp client command to view the configuration. Otherwise, the SFTP client source IP address will be 0.0.0.0 by default.
